patthana15.24:1.1: Hetusampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.24:2.1: Hetusampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.24:3.1: Hetuvippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nahetuvippayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
